Package de.systemagmbh.interfaces.logger

Interface Summary
ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch To have the possiblility to make some log output besides the output of the finished program, the DEV_LOG constant should be used.
ISysLog The interface ISysLog has only the 'log' method.
ISysLogChecker Let's give a definition of a 'log check' first:
The 'log check' is the decision if a call of the log method has to be sent to a log writer or not.
ISysLogConstants All important constants for logging are defined here.
ISysLogFormatter Let's give a definition of a 'log format' first:
The 'log format' is the way the different information like date, log level, text is composed.
ISysLogger The interface ISysLogger defines all methods for working with a logger.
ISysLoggerManager  
ISysLogWriter Let's give a definition of a 'log writer' first:
The 'log writer' is the instance of the logger, that writes a given text.
 

Class Summary
FSysLogger Use FSysLogger to load ISysLoggers and ISysLogFormatters.
 

Exception Summary
CSysLoggerException Exception for ISysLoggers and ISysLogFormatters.
